record.field: Provide salespeople with tips, lexicon and templates to help them sell faster.

field.name: template_body
field.p: Compiled below are tips & tricks collected among our veterans to help newcomers get started. We hope it will help you sign deals.
PRO TIP: From a lead, use the book button in the chatter to find this article and autocomplete your email with this template.

div.p:
I was doing some research online and found your company.
Considering we just launched ProductName, I was thinking you would be interested.

Could you please let me know on which number I could reach you so that we could get in touch?
It should not take longer than 15 minutes.

field.p: PRO TIP: From a lead, use the book button in the chatter to find this article and autocomplete your description with this qualification template.

ul.li:
Pain Points (tick the relevant ones)
Inconsistent customer experience
Complicated buying process
Costing too much money

ol.li: My Forecast will always be accurate and up-to-date
All my activities will always be encoded in our CRM
I will only sell a project if I am convinced it can be a success
I will not steal prospects from colleagues
I will not waste time and energy bad-mouthing competitors

ul.li: Be assertive but listen to what is being said
Identify the pain points and offer clear solutions
Prepare your demos in advance and integrate the prospect's use case into it

field.p:
You may have heard those a million times and yet you are not entirely sure of what it means.
Here is a quick recap for you to shine during the next meeting.

tr.td: Unique Selling Proposition: Advantage that makes you stand out from the competition.

Nth Quarter of the fiscal year.
E.g. Q4 starts on Oct. 1 and ends on Dec. 31.

record.field: Centralize account insights in one document for comprehensive monitoring and follow-up.

tr.td: Issues they are trying to solve:

font.strong: Blue: Expects accurate and rigorous results

strong.font: Yellow: Values creativity and enthusiasm above results

li.font: How do they compare and evaluate offers?
How do stakeholders interact regarding offers?

record.field: Distribute brand digital assets while ensuring compliance with company policies and guidelines.

field.name: template_body
field.p: Please submit a request for assistance to the Marketing Team if you fall into one of the following:

ul.li: Advertising that would appear online or on TV

field.p: For all other categories, we simply require you to follow the rules listed below.

td.span: Make sure to comply as you will represent our brand
If in doubt, get in touch with us.

field.p:
Here are logos that you can use at your own convenience.
They can also be shared with customers, journalists and resellers.

li.strong: Do not recreate the Logo from scratch, use these ones

ul.li: Logos should only be used in the colors provided
Always include sufficient clear space around the logo

field.p:
YourCompany is very proud of its brand image.
When representing the brand, we thus ask you to be very cautious in how you refer to the company.

ul.li: Capitalize the word YourCompany, except if it's part of an URL e.g. website/company
Always type YourCompany in the same font size and style as the content of the text
Write it without any article(the YourCompany, a YourCompany, ...)
Use the logo instead of the word inside sentences
Use the expression "YourCompanions" to refer to our community

field.p: Use this template whenever you have an announcement to make.

div.p:
250 Executive Park Blvd, Suite 3400 94134
San Francisco California (US)
United States
info@yourcompany.com
YourCompany is proud to announce that...

About YourCompany: YourCompany is a team of passionate people whose goal is to improve everyone's life through disruptive products. We build great products to solve your business problems.
Our products are designed for small to medium size companies willing to optimize their performance.

record.field: Document your Marketing Campaigns to prioritize key objectives and outcomes.

em.font: Describe your campaign in just a few words.
What are you trying to accomplish with this campaign?
Who are you trying to reach?
What are you trying to convince them of?

record.field: Answer questions frequently asked by your employees

field.name: template_body
field.h3: Who do I need to address if I need office supplies?
field.p: Instead of setting up complicated processes, we prefer to let our employees buy whatever they need. Just fill in an expense and we will reimburse you.
field.h3: Why has my expense not been reimbursed? It has been accepted.
field.p:
The Accounting team handles all payments on Fridays afternoon.
If 2 weeks have passed and you are still waiting to be paid, get in touch with them.
field.h3: How do I know which model I can order or not?
field.p: Our catalog can be found here and is updated every 2 years. If you do not manage to find the specific model you are looking for, contact our FleetOfficer
Your car can be driven by you, your spouse and by any person living under the same roof as long as they have a valid permit.
field.h3: What do I have to do if I cannot work?
field.p: Please refer to the chart below.

tr.td: Let your Team Leader know in advance.
Inform HR and your Team Leader.
Absent for more than a day
See a doctor and send us the sick note.

record.field: Analyze what went wrong and the underlying causes. Extract insights to avoid making similar mistakes in the future.

em.font: Explain what went wrong in just a few words.
Explain the consequences of this issue.
How did it get to happen?

Ask a Senior Engineer to fill this part before launching the task.
Lay here any remaining question or doubt.

field.blockquote: Q1: Would it be possible to...
Q2: Would there be an issue if...

li.font: I made sure any visual change is responsive
I made sure it did not introduce any obvious regression
I made sure it did not introduce any security flaw

record.field: Create a simple catalog to provide technical details about your products.

field.name: article_properties_definition

field.name: template_body
field.h2: How to find the perfect model for your needs üòç
field.p: Here is a short guide that will help you pick the right tiny house for you.

blockquote.span: 1. How many people will live in this house?

field.p: While tiny houses are inherently small, it's important to prioritize comfort when sharing such limited space. To ensure everyone's happiness, we recommend allowing at least 9m¬≤ per person. If you plan to live with multiple roommates, our Serenit√† model is highly recommended, providing ample space for each individual to enjoy

While tiny houses do offer a more cost-effective alternative to traditional houses, at MyCompany, we prioritize durability, which comes with a price. However, if you're on a tight budget, we have the perfect solution: our Cielo model.
It provides everything you need while allowing you to save.

blockquote.span: 3. Which style do you prefer: Natural or Industrial?

field.p: Whether your heart leans towards the rustic charm of a wooden hut or the intricate beauty of Victorian steelworks, we have you covered. Desiring a specific option? Rest assured, we are here to fulfill your wishes! Just get in touch with our architects and we will make sure to provide any specific choice you desire.
Natural Style ‚òò -
Industrial ‚öô-

blockquote.span: 4. What can I do if I haven't found exactly what I wanted?"

field.p:
If none of those offers convinced you, just get in touch with our team.
At MyCompany, your happiness is our utmost priority, and we'll go the extra mile to make sure you find what you're looking for!
